abstract: As expected, Lions Gate Entertainment is appealing a decision by regulators in British Columbia to quash a shareholders rights plan that would have helped it fend off a takeover bid by Carl Icahn.

lead_paragraph: As expected, Lions Gate Entertainment is appealing a decision by regulators in British Columbia to quash a shareholders rights plan that would have helped it fend off a takeover bid by Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Lions Gate Files to Appeal Poison-Pill Ruling
